history.content:
I received a call from someone looking for a tutor for someone taking Math 124. He writes:

Finding a tutor who took the class would be ideal. However we have asked around and we couldn't find a tutor. Hence finding a tutor for the programming part of the course would be very helpful. The programming in the course includes coding in Julia, Python, matlab. We're looking for a tutor for 3-4 hours per week, $15/hour.
If you're interested, please contact Meron Semedar at meronsemedar [at] berkeley [dot] edu. If you get the job, please let me know, so I can take this posting down.
Thank you!
Heather
history.subject: Looking for Tutor for Math 124 - Programming for Mathematical Applications
